content.rendered:
CONSIDERING SLEEKNOTE?

Get a Custom Quote

If you get more than 500,000 sessions a month and are looking for a professional engagement solution—we want to hear from you.

Fill out the contact form below to get in touch.

Contact Information

Sleeknote ApS
Jens Baggesens Vej 90A, 8200 Aarhus

+45 71 99 77 07

mail@sleeknote.com

Grow Your Business without Limits

Sleeknote helps 2,000+ online retailers in 40+ countries engage their visitors without hurting the user experience. Learn how we can help your business, too.

  • Get a Dedicated Customer Success Manager. Got a question? No problem. Get the help you need when you need it from a dedicated account manager.
  • Thorough User Onboarding. Learn how to get the most out of Sleeknote even if you’re starved for time. We’ll show you how to optimize your campaigns for higher conversions and more.
  • Enjoy Unlimited Users, Sites, and SleekBoxes. Use Sleeknote to maximize your existing traffic and increase site-wide conversions without limits to your account.

TRUSTED BY
